snippet: LeBron James endured his worst shooting night of the season, and still delivered the biggest basket of the game.
abstract: Miami Heat defeat Memphis Grizzlies, 98-91, to extend their winning streak to 13 games; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James endured his worst shooting night of the season, and still delivered the biggest basket of the game.

headline.seo: Heat Beat Grizzlies and Celtics Defeat Warriors
headline.main: Heat Top Grizzlies for 13th Win in a Row
